Package com.hankoh.scheduleapp.controller

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.hankoh.scheduleapp.controller.Internationalizable
com.hankoh.scheduleapp.controller.CustomerController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomerAddController, CustomerEditController
public class CustomerController extends Internationalizable
Parent controller for Customer controllers. Shares FXML elements for add and edit.
